Articles.Content: So I have never seriously started playing career mode until now, and with money, unmanned probes seem like a good idea. I am wondering if I go to Duna, take science stuff and transmit it back to kerbin, and then later go to duna with a manned mission and bring science back to kerbin, will the values for the manned mission will be lower?

There are specific values you can reach in one science field. If you transmit some, your kerbals will retrieve less when going there. And you cant transmit data above a certain limit. You must send kerbals there to get the rest.
